title: Interpretation of drinking barley in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of drinking barley in a dream, via the website roy2a.com. Seeing barley in a dream means very good and enjoying good health, and drinking barley means recovering from illness and removing anxiety, sadness, and pain because it shows religiosity and good character. Married, pregnant, or also a widow. As for the divorced woman, interpretations are provided by the major imams of interpretation of visions and dreams, such as Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin, in the past and in the present. Follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of the vision of drinking barley in a dream by Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing barley in a dream indicates the acquisition of money. Many prestigious jobs or heritage. Seeing yourself drinking barley in a dream indicates earning money without fatigue or hardship, and getting rich after a short period of time. Seeing collecting barley in a dream shows the fulfillment of one’s desire, success, and repentance from sins. Seeing barley in a dream indicates an abundance of good deeds and abundance. Benevolence. Seeing barley in a dream indicates the end of worry and anxiety and overcoming difficulties. See also: Interpretation of seeing wheat, corn, or barley flour in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing drinking barley in a dream for a single woman? Seeing barley in a dream for a single woman It indicates the fulfillment of one’s desires and goals in Life, as well as good news and surprises. Seeing a girl with barley indicates rest after fatigue and a comfortable life because it indicates her marriage to a rich young man. If a girl sees barley soaked in water, it indicates her recovery from illness if she is sick, or that she is in good health and that the girl is free of diseases. See also: Interpretation of seeing ears of corn in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing drinking barley in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing drinking barley in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the birth of a female, and if she is seen holding ears of barley, it indicates the birth of a boy. If a pregnant woman sees barley in her dream, It indicates the approaching date of childbirth, an easy and natural birth, and the cessation of fatigue and pain. What is the interpretation of seeing a woman drinking barley in a dream? Seeing barley in a dream for a married woman indicates happiness, family and marital stability, and an improvement in financial conditions. Seeing a woman drinking barley in a dream indicates the disappearance of pain and fatigue and the disappearance of sadness and worry. And hearing the good news. If a married woman sees that she is taking barley from someone, this indicates that she is blessed with a good son, righteousness and blessing in her life, and the benefit she obtains from a person. Seeing barley bread in a dream for a married woman indicates marital and financial stability, family ties and religious righteousness. See Also: Interpretation of seeing performance in a dream. What is the interpretation of drinking barley in a dream with lead? Seeing drinking barley in a dream and it is absolute. It indicates complete health and well-being and the elimination of pain, insomnia and anxiety. See fermented barley. It indicates leniency in worldly desires and distance from the approach of God. What is the interpretation of a dream? Green barley ears for single women? Seeing barley ears in a dream for a single woman indicates her marriage to a righteous, religious and wealthy young man. Seeing green barley ears for a single girl in a dream indicates good morals

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about hair loss for an unmarried woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for unmarried women: A girl’s hair is the crown of her head is a famous saying that many girls believe in. There is no doubt that seeing an unmarried woman losing her hair in a dream can make her feel sad and anxious about its interpretations, especially if she sees in her dream that it is completely falling out and becoming bald, so in this article we will discuss the most important hundreds of interpretations of a dream about hair loss for single women and know all the signs. Whether it is positive or negative. Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for unmarried women. Hair loss in a dream for a single woman can indicate exposure to crises and dealing with worries and problems. However, if an unmarried woman sees her hair falling out and it falling into food, this may indicate distress and distress in life. As for hair The yellow dreamer is a welcome sign of getting rid of problems and feeling joy and psychological comfort after exhaustion and sadness. The dreamer holding her hair that falls from her hand in a dream is a sign that she keeps her money and does not waste it. Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for a single woman by Ibn Sirin According to Ibn Sirin, there are positive interpretations of a dream Single women with hair loss, such as: Ibn Sirin interprets the dream of hair loss for unmarried women as a sign of longevity and good health. If an unmarried woman sees her hair falling out and holds it in her hand, this indicates a promotion at work and material reward. Heavy hair loss in a dream The girl and picking it up from the ground is a sign of her good character, fulfillment of her promise and discipline in her behavior. Interpretation of a dream about excessive hair loss for a single woman: Interpretation of a dream about excessive hair loss for unmarried women may indicate that she is committing sins and acts of disobedience. While the fortune teller saw her hair falling out profusely, she gathered it, a sign of She reaped the fruits of her efforts after hard work, success, and reaching the top. An engaged girl who sees her hair falling out profusely in a dream may fail in her engagement and break up with her partner. Seeing hair falling out a lot in an unmarried woman’s dream could be a reflection of her bad psychological state and feelings of loneliness, isolation, and loss of interest. Interpretation of a dream about hair falling out on an unmarried woman and crying about it. Interpretation of a dream about hair falling out on a single woman and crying about it may indicate that you are facing challenges and feeling weak and helpless. Seeing hair falling out in a girl’s dream and crying indicates her inability to manage her life’s affairs and her suffering from successive crises and difficulties that It hinders the way of achieving her goals. Hair falling out a lot in the dreamer’s dream and she is sad about it, and crying may be a sign that she is suffering from an illness. The student who was studying and was in the exam period and saw in her dream that her hair was falling out a lot and she was crying. She feels physically and psychologically exhausted from the pressures of that period, but Do not worry. She will be able to succeed. If the hair is curly and thick and the unmarried woman sees that she falls in a dream often and becomes sad, then this is good news about positive changes in her life, and crying here is a symbol of comfort and reaching a lot of happiness.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a whole Agwa in a dream?

preview.html:
Haduta website offers you a complete interpretation of seeing Agfa in a dream.
Ajva are moist, seedless dates. Agfa in a dream Kamil is one of the dreams that many people dream of in a dream Kamil. Therefore, we offer you, dear followers, all the advice and details about the interpretation of seeing a tablet with Ajwa in a complete dream, as well as the interpretation of Ajwa in a dream for general women and the interpretation of the sleeping atmosphere for married and pregnant women, as well as for men, through the most important dream and vision books. Why does Ajva dream? All dream interpretation researchers have indicated To see the entire Agfa in a dream is a desirable vision and bodes well. Also, Agfa in a dream is evidence that the dreamer in his next life will collect a lot of halal money. Agfa in a complete dream is a sign of kindness, abundant support and the fact that the dreamer has achieved many benefits in His life.There is agva in a dream for a sick person – evidence of a quick recovery from illness and improvement of health.Seeing a full ajva in a dream is a sign that all worries and problems will go away and that the dreamer will enter a period full of joy.Why dream of giving a full ajva in a dream to someone indicates compatibility A great deal between them, whether in marriage, work or partnership. Why dream of a woman? Agfa in a dream for a poor woman means the end of her problems and sorrows and the improvement of her situation in every sense of the word. There is an agfa in a woman’s dream – a sign of kindness, support and fulfillment of many desires and goals. A complete agfa in A dream for an unmarried woman is the good news that he has given her a good husband, piety, love, happiness and joy. Ajva indicates socializing and gathering, as well as collecting things that will happen a lot of useful and wonderful things in her life. Why does Ajva dream of a married woman? Ajva in a dream full of a married woman indicates It indicates that they will harvest good food and that they will get a lot of money in their life. Seeing a full Agfa in a dream for a married woman means stability in her life, happiness, and recovery from all diseases and adversities. Also, seeing the full story of Agfa in a dream and eating it for a woman indicates a life free of worries, problems and sorrows. Why does a pregnant woman dream that she is thin? Seeing a whole ajwa in a dream for a pregnant woman is one of the desired dreams under any circumstances and indicates recovery from illness and good health. Also, a pregnant woman’s dream of eating dates indicates ease of childbirth and her safe exit from it. Why do you dream of recording In the stroke, seeing a disc of ajwa in a dream indicates many desirable things in the life of the aware person and is a guide for the entrepreneur to succeed and be successful in his work. Seeing the whole ajwa in a dream means an abundance of money and enormous wealth that the dreamer will collect and enjoy in his life. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, Leave it in the comments below and our team will get back to you.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing an octopus in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing an octopus in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Seeing an octopus in a dream means achieving goals and success. The black octopus shows envy, and seeing an octopus in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the birth of a beautiful girl and enjoyment of good health. An octopus in a dream indicates the presence of a traitor and a hypocrite in the viewer’s life. Seeing an octopus in a dream interprets problems, fears, and turmoil and indicates that salvation and eating squid meat gain strength. A dream to see an octopus for a single woman. An octopus in a dream shows the strength of his character, his perseverance, and his willingness to achieve his goals. A black octopus in a dream for a single girl shows envy that makes her jealous, and a white octopus expresses a person who is paying attention. Towards her and trying to approach her in different ways. A dream of seeing an octopus for a pregnant woman. An octopus in a dream is a sign for a pregnant woman that she will give birth safely and in good health, and an octopus in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a beautiful woman and she will become strong and bold and will be distinguished by eating it. Octopus and pregnant meat indicate wealth. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she was attacked by an octopus, this means that she will enter a difficult stage in her life and serious suffering. The black octopus in her dream indicates the enemy. Seeing an octopus indicates stability in life and good health. Interpretation of eating an octopus in a dream: An octopus in a dream has many interpretations for good and evil. White spots, and the red color in the dream shows love, happiness, and good news, and black is undesirable. It shows that there are people in the dreamer’s life who do not wish him well, and this is one of the bad aspects of seeing an octopus. If in a dream you find an octopus attacking the dreamer, this is a sign of difficulties, pain, problems in the person’s life, and defeat. Dream. Seeing a small octopus. The octopus in a dream represents wealth, power, status, and luxury. The white and red octopus is praiseworthy in the dream and indicates the happiness and stability of marriage. He is in good health and recovering from diseases, and seeing an octopus attacking and fighting with him shows fears and problems. Dreaming of seeing a red octopus. An octopus in a dream shows power, wealth, pride, and guilt when it hunts. And it eats. It reflects problems and fears, and the red octopus indicates beautiful feelings and emotions. Seeing an octopus in a dream: An octopus in a dream indicates sustenance, abundance of money, strength, and power. Seeing a large octopus attacking the monarch, but being able to escape from it, this vision may indicate death and overcoming adversity and obstacles. A guide to getting rid of worries and problems. Seeing an octopus attacking the dreamer indicates conflict in life and problems surrounding the pioneer. Seeing an octopus attack also shows that there are people around him who hate him and want to destroy his life. Seeing him eating octopus meat is a good vision and indicates that the dreamer will find a prestigious job or will On an inheritance. Anyone who sees himself eating octopus during pregnancy indicates the inheritance that he will receive in the near future. Seeing eating octopus meat in a dream is a good vision and indicates the abundance of food and the abundance of food.

title: Interpretation of eating lamb in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of eating cooked lamb in a dream on different occasions There is no doubt that meat has a delicious and pleasant taste, especially lamb or mutton, and lamb is associated with many of us with holidays, celebrations and celebrations, and on the contrary, there are those who do not prefer to eat lamb in all its forms and types, so it is certain that seeing lamb in a dream has a meaning and interpretation, and for this we present to you today in our encyclopedia article more details. Interpretation of the interpretation of eating lamb in a dream: Interpretations of seeing a lamb in a dream have varied and differ according to the type of meat, its color and the state of its roasting, in addition to the dreamer's feeling when eating lamb and other details that certainly affect the interpretation of the dream. Interpretation of eating lamb in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great interpreter and great researcher Ibn Sirin believes that seeing him eating lamb in the dreamer's house, if this meat has been skinned and grilled, is evidence that he will communicate with people he does not know, and that he hosts them. They have in his home and benefit from them a lot, but if the lamb meat in the dream is lean and weak, this is an indication that the people who will communicate with him and enjoy him in his home will not benefit him from the person's inheritance. If he sees lamb meat cooking on the fire, this is evidence of spending money on fatigue and illness, but if the lamb is immature, it is a sign of disputes and disagreements that disturb the fortune teller. Interpretation of eating lamb meat in a dream by Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi agrees with Ibn Sirin's opinion in saying: Whoever finds shredded lamb meat in a dream, he is in contact with people he does not know. The fortune teller gets money through the heir. Interpretation of eating lamb meat in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: Ibn Shaheen's opinion agrees with the opinion of both Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, but he adds that cooked lamb meat can be interpreted in three ways. It is good news for the emergence of nutrition. Explanation of eating cooked lamb for single, married, pregnant women and men: Eating cooked lamb in a dream in general may portend the coming of goodness and livelihood for the visionary, and he may get what he desires and asks for, but after a period of fatigue. It portends a calamity, illness or death, God forbid. Explanation of eating cooked lamb for unmarried women: If an unmarried girl sees that she was invited to a table, and she sees grilled meat and eats it and it tastes delicious, then this is good news of the coming of livelihood and kindness and perhaps the fulfillment of the wishes she asks for. But if an unmarried woman sees that she is cooking lamb in a dream, then this is a sign of the new life that she will start with her husband and she will be happy in it and bear responsibility and form a small family and prepare food for it. They. Explanation of eating cooked lamb for a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream cooked lamb, and this meat tastes good and has a good color, it is good for her to enjoy an abundance of money, whether that money is from work or inheritance. But if the meat has a bad color and taste, this is a warning of loss or failure to fulfill the desires she asks for, or perhaps little nutrition. Interpretation of eating cooked lamb for a pregnant woman: Seeing pregnancy in a dream with cooked lamb, whether

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the jinn in a dream for a single or married woman, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing jinn in a dream for a single and married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing jinn in a dream is one of the visions that cause fear and panic in the dreamer. Jinn are creatures of God Almighty, and God Almighty protects us from jinn with memories to save himself from them. There are many different interpretations and connotations of seeing the jinn in a dream, and in this article we will talk about the interpretation of the dream of seeing the jinn in a dream for single and married women according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the jinn in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing jeans in a dream varies depending on the condition of the jeans, whether the jeans are good or spoiled. In these points, we will explain to you the interpretation of a dream about seeing jeans in a dream for a single woman who is married to a son. Sirin: Seeing light jeans in a dream means that the dreamer will meet people of knowledge and increase his knowledge and that they will be loyal friends to him. As for the evil, corrupt jinn that he dreams of, this indicates that the dreamer does not like the people around him. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing Jinn in general indicates the presence of thieves who are waiting for the life of the dreamer and want to harm him and harm him, and they want to harm him and one must be careful. Seeing a jinn in a dream means that the dreamer is a cunning person and that people fear him because he is clever in cunning and deception. Seeing a good jinn who remembers God in a dream indicates However, the person who has the vision is a righteous person who obeys God and fears Him, but the corrupt jinn shows the corruption of the dreamer and therefore he must be corrected and avoided. Carrying out acts of disobedience and obedience a lot. Seeing jeans in a dream means frequent trips and journeys in search of knowledge and knowledge. Ibn Sirin believes that the dreamer’s vision of the jinn learning from the Holy Qur’an indicates the dreamer’s high status and that he will take high positions in life. As for whoever dreams of a jinn walking behind him This indicates that there are malicious and hateful enemies who follow him and want to lure him away from the right path and follow his desires. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing drowning in a dream for the unmarried and married woman of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the jinn in one dream according to Ibn Sirin. The dream of the jinn is one of the dreams that many girls see. In their dreams, this vision has many different interpretations and associations, and in these points we will show you the interpretation of the dream of seeing the jinn in one dream according to Ibn Sirin. If an unmarried girl sees a pair of jeans in her dream, this means that she should beware of her friends, as they are mean and hateful to her. This vision of an unmarried girl reading Surah Al-Ikhlas and Al-Mu’awadin is evidence that she is immune from envy. If an unmarried girl sees a jinn in her dream and it approaches From her, she rejects him, on the grounds that in reality there is someone who wants to approach him to harm her, so she must be careful not to harm her. This vision is in the dream of an unmarried girl who is afraid of the jinn and is reading the Holy Qur’an for her closeness to God Almighty and the removal of worries and problems that she suffers from. Including the girl. This dream indicates isolation and fear of the future. Seeing an unmarried girl reciting Ayat al-Kursi while wearing jeans is evidence of...

title: Interpretation of a dream about embracing one’s mother in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a mother’s embrace in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. A dream about a mother’s embrace in a dream is considered one of the dreams that express the mother’s attachment to the family and her desire to make it cohesive in her life. The mother is the protective shield of the family and seeks to make it cohesive in the heart. There is a lot of research on the interpretation of the dream of embracing the mother in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, as we will learn. Information will appear to you about what is the interpretation of seeing my mother and sister in a dream, the interpretation of a dream about a mother’s embrace in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, what is the interpretation of seeing a dead mother in a dream, and what is the interpretation? From seeing a mother in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing my mother and sister in a dream? The interpretation of seeing my mother and sister in a dream has many interpretations, including the dreamer seeing the death of my mother and sister in a dream, which indicates longevity, God willing. Worries and sadness, and the interpretation of the vision depends on the situation in which the dreamer is inside the vision, and the precise details of that vision to reach its correct and correct purpose. Interpretation of a dream of hugging a mother in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In the interpretation of holding a mother’s arms in a dream by Ibn Sirin, a married woman’s embrace of her children and husband indicates The great family bonding and cohesion between them, and if the vision shows a mother hugging her children in a dream, then this indicates the good news that will come to the dreamer in the coming period. This vision also indicated the mother’s intense fear for her son and her desire to protect him from all enemies and disasters around him. An explanation stating that this vision indicates lasting happiness between the dreamer and her husband. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead mother in a dream? The interpretation of seeing a dead mother in a dream shows fear of the coming future and a feeling of loneliness in the dreamer, as the translator Ibn Sirin reported that the death of the mother in a sick person’s dream It shows the approaching term, but if the dreamer is poor, this indicates the acquisition of goodness and blessing. In the end, God willing. What is the interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream? The interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream indicates safety, security, and advice. The mother in a dream is the secret. As for whoever sees her mother crying in a dream, she will cry soon, but if she sees her mother laughing in a dream, this It indicates that he will laugh at humanity coming in this coming period. As for the mother’s anger at her daughter in a dream, it indicates the girl’s disobedience and the misguidance she is entering into, and that she should be moderate in her life and stay away from the path of misguidance. It is mentioned that the dream interpretation of hugging a mother in a dream depends on the condition of the dreamer or the individual of this dream, as it brings him good or bad. . Interpretation of seeing a dead mother in a dream and what is the interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream.

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing an uncle in an unmarried woman’s dream?

preview.html: Seeing an uncle in a single woman’s dream, one of the familiar things in our lives is saying “uncle,” and it is indeed a symbol of security, strength, and bond in a girl’s life. If a good man and many girls see this in their dream, it is one of the dreams that has many interpretations and meanings, and when some girls see This vision makes them curious to know the meanings of this dream. In this topic, we will explain its connotations in all its aspects in detail. Follow this article with us. Seeing an uncle in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an uncle in a dream for an unmarried woman, this indicates that the date of her marriage is close to a man who has good moral qualities, including a good heart and piety, and God Almighty will fear him in her. If an unmarried girl sees an uncle in her dream This indicates that she feels joy and happiness in her life. Seeing an unmarried woman with her uncle in a dream indicates that the Almighty Creator will grant her many good and blessings. If an unmarried girl sees her uncle in her dream and is suffering from some problems or crises in reality, these are praiseworthy visions. For her, because she will get rid of all these matters soon and her circumstances will change for the better. Seeing an unmarried dreamer with her uncle holding her hand in a dream indicates his support and assistance to her in reality. If the girl’s uncle has already fallen ill and sees his death during her sleep, this is evidence of the approaching date of his meeting with The Creator, Glory be to Him. Seeing an uncle in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing an uncle according to Ibn Sirin in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the visions that have many interpretations and meanings, and in these points we will interpret the dream about the uncle. Follow with us: If one sees his uncle crying in a dream, this means that he is facing a major crisis, so he must be careful and observant. Seeing a married man visiting his uncle in a dream means that his wife will become pregnant. In the event that he sees an unmarried young man in his dream, this may symbolize That he will meet a girl with beautiful and attractive features and good moral qualities, and he will marry her and feel secure and happy in his life. Her. Whoever sees his uncle in a dream showing signs of anger and anger, this indicates that the dreamer has committed many wrong actions and is unable to think correctly, so he may fall into many problems and obstacles and he must be careful and try to change them. Himself so that he does not feel remorse. Seeing a cousin in a dream for an unmarried woman. Seeing a cousin in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will be exposed to many problems and obstacles in her life. If an unmarried girl sees her cousin in a dream, this may indicate her intense need for Someone to help her, support her, take care of her, and encourage her so that she can face the difficulties she will face. Seeing an unmarried dreamer with her cousin hugging her in a dream means that God Almighty will grant her many blessings and benefits. In the event that an unmarried woman sees herself being carried by her cousin in In her dream, this could be a sign that she is in a relationship with him in reality and this dream also describes her feeling of love towards him. title: Interpretation of a dream about going to an amusement park

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the vision of going to an amusement park in a dream. The dream of seeing the vision of going to an amusement park in a dream is one of the frequently circulated dreams that many people around the world dream of. Therefore, the psychological and good mood that the dreamer is experiencing is considered one of the positive dreams that can bring goodness to its owner, but interpretations differ from one interpreter to another and according to the individual’s position in the dream. Interpretation of the vision of going to an amusement park: Parks in general are among the distinctive means of entertainment that most people frequent. Because it conveys happiness and pleasure to the hearts, and many people know the interpretation of the dream of going to an amusement park, the interpretations of which are as follows: Interpretations differed regarding this dream, some of them said that it is a sign of fun and enjoyment, and others explained that it indicates diving into the world of life and worldly temptations. Some interpreters interpreted that seeing an amusement park in a dream could mean that the dreamer is struggling to make decisions. Seeing an amusement park could indicate cunning, deception, deviating from the straight line, and choosing crooked paths. Some commentators also explained that seeing amusement parks could be evidence of his love. For worldly matters and his abandonment of the duties and tasks assigned to him by his boss.Interpretation of the vision of going to an amusement park by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin is one of the most famous and famous interpreters in the world, and many people rely on their interpretations because they are accurate. The dream of going to an amusement park was interpreted with several interpretations, each of which differs according to the circumstances of the fortuneteller, and his interpretations of the dream of going to an amusement park are as follows: Ibn Sirin explained that seeing an amusement park indicates the pursuit of pleasures and forgetting religion. Seeing an amusement park in a dream may indicate a deceitful character who uses cunning in life. To achieve its goal without difficulty. But if a person sees in a dream that he entered an amusement park and sat in it for a while, this indicates that he has many difficult choices on the professional level and he cannot determine the most appropriate one for him. Ibn Sirin also interpreted this dream as an indication of a lack of religion. Hearts away from God and attachment to desires. But if a person sees himself swinging in the games and falling from them, this is evidence that he will go through specific periods. Without realizing it, he will find himself surrounded by many difficulties. Interpretation of a dream about a park for single people: Watching parks in general is considered one of the things that indicates... Happiness and joy, which may sometimes bring kindness to the viewer, knowing that interpretations differ from one person to another, and interpretations of a dream about an amusement park for single people are as follows: Seeing a girl herself going to an amusement park, this means that there will be a transformation that will change her life in a way that she did not imagine, and it means that she You will receive good news. But if an unmarried girl sees herself swinging in a game, this is evidence that she is satisfied with her life and does not suffer from the problem of delayed marriage opportunities.
